title: Beautiful Contemporary Bunglow Overlooking Lagoon At Uswetakeiyawa
details: 70 Perches Boat House Overlooking The Spectacular Negombo Lagoon, Built By Expact Owner, Selling Only Becuase Migrating Back, This Property Is One Of Its Kind Property In Sri Lanka And A Rare Bunglow Build On A Very Contemporary Design. The Bunglow Consist Of 4 Bed Rooms And Overlooks The Beautiful Negombo Lagoon . The Property Is Just 5 Minutes From The Jetwing Lagoon Hotel. A Must See
